column1: in memory of doris spangler reece -- mullins funeral home & crematory| doris spangler reece. july 22
column9: 2015 at her home in radford. she was a member of central united methodist church and a retired medical secretary. she was preceded in death by her parents
column11: peyton t. reece; and her son
column12: carl david reece. survivors include her son
column13: ricky reece and joy arnau; grandchildren
column15: lyndsay and dustin reece; sister june nester; sister-in-law
column16: mary bob spangler; and many other relatives and friends. funeral services will be held at 11 a. m. tuesday
column18: 2015 at the mullins funeral home in radford with pastor don shelor officiating. interment will follow in highland memory gardens in dublin. the family will receive friend from 6 until 8 p. m. monday evening at the funeral home. the reece family is in the care of mullins funeral home & crematory in radford. www. mullinsfuneralhome. com
